page.title: 20SHIPSTON AND THE M40
page.content:
In the 1930s, the route of a possible {by-pass}was planned for Shipston-on- Stour.It was not built and the traffic problem in the town increased.
The new{M40}extension from Oxford to Birmingham will be commenced in 1987 and should be finished in 1990.This should reduce the traffic on the A34 through Shipston.It is estimated that the new motorway will take between 8000 and 12000 vehicles per day away from the A34 at Shipston.
We asked people in Shipston if they thought the M40 or a by-pass would be better for Shipston.40% said that the M40 would be better,while 60% thought a by-pass would help more.
